resources.string: My Name is Hossein Panahi Irdemousa and i am graduated computer science student from Amirkabir University of Technology
I created this application to demonstrate some of my skills that i learned in 5 years of android development.
In this application i have used my skills in Android application development such as MVVM architecture, Room, Dependency Injection, LiveData, view and data binding, Android jetpack components, etc.
